ats_breakdown.notes: Excellent keyword integration. Strong use of metrics (1400%, $55M, 300%). Formatting is clean. 15/15 top priority keywords included.

recommendations: Consider adding 'Consumer Subscription' keyword explicitly if possible, though 'Recurring Revenue model' covers the concept.
Ensure 'End-to-End Experience' phrase remains prominent in future edits as it's a high-frequency JD term.
